trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_000<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>!? What an honor to speak with you! If you have any questions, I should be glad to answer them!
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask about?
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_001<tab>Tell me about yourself.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_002<tab>Sinus Ardorum.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_003<tab>The Cosmoor.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_004<tab>Calabash Cove.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_005<tab>Weddingway's Bower.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_006<tab>Gleamslope.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_007<tab>The lunar nadir.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_008<tab>The Moongate Hub facilities.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_A1_000_009<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_001<tab>I was a researcher's assistant in charge of filing documents at the Archeion. When I learned of the Cosmic Exploration Initiative, I knew at once that I wished to take part─to lend my expertise to the cause.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_002<tab>And I'm not the only one. You'll find many of those here are scholars who previously had a hand in planning the great exodus. Surprisingly, the work is scarcely any different.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_003<tab>Of course, I never dared dream that I would travel to the moon and meet the Loporrits! Scarcely a dull moment around here, and no shortage of friendly faces besides.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_004<tab>Sinus Ardorum is what we call this crater we occupy. Believe it or not, we've got a fairly stable living environment nestled in here.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_005<tab>They say that Namingway dreamt up the name and its meaning. Fitting, considering he did the same for countless landmarks in Mare Lamentorum some thousand years ago.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_006<tab>For a blessing, this place has ready access to stellar currents, making it an ideal port to harbor a starship! I'm told they're akin to the aetherial currents you might find back home.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_007<tab>The Cosmoor is the central sector of Sinus Ardorum where the Moongate Hub is situated. It's our gateway into space!

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_008<tab>Here you'll find facilities like the Lunar Hopopolis, the cosmoports, and the crew's habitation modules. Lately it's starting to feel like a little village, almost...

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_009<tab>You know, if our interstellar expeditions continue far into the future, perhaps one day this place will grow into a proper thriving harbor! I'd love to see it.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_010<tab>Calabash Cove is a smaller crater in the northwest sector of Sinus Ardorum, named for the bottle gourd shape of the local reservoir.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_011<tab>Nearly all of the moon's spring water is tainted with poisonous aetherochemicals, mind you, but luckily our rainbow crystal purifies that sort of thing.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_012<tab>We've documented rock formations rich in corrupted crystal clusters nearby─and they're slowly growing. Under the surface, the aetheric currents could very well be unstable.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_013<tab>Seen the bright pink moss, have you? It's an experimental garden designed to explore the unique attributes of a lunar ecosystem.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_014<tab>There's also an aetherochemical pool in the area that we call Palus Arsenici─the “marsh of arsenic.” It may look pretty, but that doesn't make it safe to play in.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_015<tab>Yet the native flora seem to thrive regardless... Have they the ability to filter the contaminants from the water? One of many things we're investigating!

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_016<tab>Gleamslope is a smaller crater ensconced in a mountainous crystalline formation in the southwest sector of Sinus Ardorum. You can enter it through Piercingway Tunnel.
TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_017<tab>Inside, we've found debris seemingly Allagan in origin─and if our theory holds, it's connected to the Heimdall in Mare Lamentorum.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_018<tab>Perhaps the vessel broke into scattered pieces as it crashed? Incredible to think the effects of the Seventh Umbral Calamity rippled as far as the moon...

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_019<tab>You've seen that canyon to the northeast, I take it? The lunar nadir refers to the cavern at the bottom. Just ride the nadir lift down to reach it!

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_020<tab>It's like a whole different world down there. Jagged crystal clusters, spots of fungi growing all over the place, not to mention the aetherial falls...

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_021<tab>That sort of isolated environment is ripe for experimentation, so we're planning a few tests. With any luck, the data may prove useful on other stars!

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_022<tab>You'll have to be more specific! The hub has everything a settlement needs─power, water, you name it. Every facility here is controlled by the rainbow crystal.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_023<tab>This technology is truly first-rate─a perfect marriage of Loporrit magicks and Sharlayan brilliance! Every parameter is recorded automatically to improve efficiency.

TEXT_CTSWKS72MOONGATEHUB_00934_WHISPERINGWILLOW_000_024<tab>Perhaps one day we'll have the means to predict what environments await us on other stars. Until then, there's much to be learned from the data we acquire here!
